text: anak min trauv sangsoek nung puok yeung daoysaarte puok yeung mean chomnue nung banda ph so d tang nei mcheasa robsa puok yeung pel del vea ban mokadl puok yeung noh laey . ao mcheasa robsa puok yeung. saum trong me tda bratan kar atthmot dl puok yeung ning bratan aoy puok yeung ban slab knongnam chea mou slei m phng choh
